items.sentence: Mary took her phone out of her purse and took a picture.
Mary works as a waitress at a restaurant on Park Street.
Now that you mention it, I do remember that we did that.
She arrived at school on time in spite of the snowstorm.
She was wearing a green coat with a matching mini-skirt.
This is where I brought my girlfriend on our first date.
Why can\'t people just try to get along with each other?
Why don\'t you invite Tom over to watch a video with us?
Tom shouldn\'t have told Mary that he\'d been in prison.
Tom might know why Mary wasn\'t at yesterday\'s meeting.
Tom must\'ve known Mary wouldn\'t want him at her party.
Boys as well as girls will be affected by this decision.
Tom doesn\'t care whether Mary does her homework or not.
Tom doesn\'t like the color of the walls in his bedroom.
The reason Tom isn\'t here is because he\'s sick in bed.
You\'re not the kind of girl that I usually go out with.
A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
What are the chances that we\'ll have a white Christmas?
Tom didn\'t need to come here. He could\'ve just called.
Tom didn\'t say whether he went to Mary\'s party or not.
